content:
ICS 1C HW 2 for Justin Ward Skeleton -- Heading

About QQ Skeleton

Name:Justin L. Ward
E-mail: easu615@ea.oac.uci.edu
Major: Political Science

Three neat Web finds:

  1. One interesting find was the Business Corporations Sex page (http://akebono.stanford.edu/yahoo/Business/corporations/Sex/)
  2. Another interesting find was the Daily News page. (http://akebono.stanford.edu/yahoo/News/Daily/
  3. The third interesting find was the About the SanJose Mercury Center page (http:/www.sjmercury.com/about.htm

Questions I can now answer
  1. Where are law schools on the World Wide Web located?
  2. Name three World Wide Web browsers.
  3. Who is the governor of Washington state?
  4. What is the binary representation of the number 377?
  5. How is the World Wide Web different from other communication?
  1. Where are law schools which you are interested in on the World Wide Web located and what are some of the services the school offers to students?
    The law schools on the World Wide Web are located in the law schools and law firms on the WWW URL. They are also located in the WWW virtual library of law. Both of these document URLs have various law schools located in their database. The law schools and law firms document URL also has law firms which helps the student to look ahead for after law school. Each of the various schools gives information on how to apply to the school, what types of scholarships they offer, and the type of financial aid that is available. There are various resources to which you can access the schools themselves. Law schools. & The WWW Virtual Law Library.

    Return to list of questions.

  2. Name two World Wide Web browsers and explain their differences.
    Two World Wide Web browsers are Lynx and Mosaic. Lynx is a text-only World Wide Web client. It does not display graphics and therefore is much faster than Mosaic. Right now Lynx can be run on UNIX and VMS. Mosaic is a browser that allows you to access sound, binary pictures, moving pictures, as well as text. It is currently the most popular browser, because of these assets. Additionally, it the browser this ICS.1C class is using. There is also a third World Wide Web browser, Netscape, which is gaining ground on Mosaic in terms of being the most popular Web browser.Mosaic & Lynx

    Return to list of questions.

  3. What is a document URL?
    A document URL is a string of characters that distinguish a resource on the internet and identifies the type of media that is being used. It allows for the linking within HTML hypertext read by Web browsers. URLs create information spaces on the Web in terms of the protocol used and the spaces represent a big well of knowledge that the Web can dip its jug in.The basic format for many URLs is : scheme://host:port/path. The scheme is one of the ways to retrieve or send information through the internet. The host is the computer that the resource is located in. The port is a number that distinguishesthe service you are requesting from the host. The path is an the location of a resource on a particular host. URLs & HTML

    Return to list of questions.

  4. Name two URLs that have the latest sports information, choose one and give some information on three of the major sports.
    Two URLs that have the latest sports information are Satchel Sports and the Mercury Newspaper sports page. Satchel sports is a very detailed sports information server that has everything a sports fan could want. It even keeps up to date on sports that are not even in season. I found out information about three of my home teams. The San Jose Sharks beat the Vancouver, British Columbia Canucs by a score of 3 to 1. The San Francisco 49ers released defensive tackle Richard dent because he is injured and has a very big salary. The Golden State Warriors' Chris Mullin injured himself at home when he fell and had a concussion. It is not known when he will be able to return back to basketball.Sharks & Warriors & 49ers

    Return to list of questions.

  5. Where are some of the current governors in the states of the United States located and name at least two governors who you did not know before and give some of their responsibilities, and/or accomplishments or information about them.
    Each of the governments of each of the states in the United States is listed under the state World Wide Web Servers. The governor of Hawaii is Benjamin Cayetano. He is responsible for the execution of laws and the supervision of the executive departments. The governor of Maryland is William Donald Schaefer. His phone number is (301) 974-3901. Hawaiin Governor & Maryland Governor

    Return to list of questions.

Submitted February 16, 1995 for ICS 1C
